ac.special: 14 + the level of the spell (armadura natural)

trait.name: Shared Resistances
entries: When you summon the dragon, choose one of its damage resistances. You have resistance to the chosen damage type until the spell ends.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dragon uses its Breath Weapon, and it makes a number of Bite and Claw attacks equal to half the spell's level (rounded down).

action.name: Bite and Claw
entries: {@atk mw} el teu modificador d'atac de conjurs a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}{@damage 1d6 + 4 + summonSpellLevel} de dany perforant.

action.name: Breath Weapon
entries: The dragon exhales a stream of multicolored energy in a 30-foot cone. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea must make a Dexterity saving throw, taking {@damage 2d6} damage of your choice of a damage type this dragon has resistance to on a failed save, ; si supera, en rep la meitat.
